Hydras:

"What if I offer you one of my scientist?"hissed hydras "in exchange of the 
base and one protophorm?"

-----Original Message----- 
From: Super Cyclonus
Sent: Wednesday, November 10, 2010 1:19 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: The wrath of the Hydra/The return of a decepticon

> <OLD>
>
> "Good warriors like them are hard to find"hissed Hydras"And i cant afford
> loose any one else... If we desire to sucssed over MAximals and other 
> treats
> we must stick together and avoid unecesary looses... So my tutor, What do
> you want in exchange for my men, the base and the protphorm? "

<NEW>

Cryotek gave Hydras a long look, his optics thoughtful as he observed
his former student. He placed his elbow on the arm rest of his chair
as he silently contemplated the new head of the Predacon forces as he
knew it.

Finally he shook his head, a strange look of confusion and then
disappointment on his face. "You have misunderstood me." His optics
brightened, "I am not implying that I want to give you anything."
Cryotek shrugged, "But if you had had something special to offer
perhaps we could have come to an agreement." Cryotek waved his hand
dissmissively. "but it seems that you have nothing."

"I offered you the base, but you did not wish to take it." Cryotek
gestured with a clawed hand as he spoke, pointing at the security
cameras, one of which showed Hydras' men in holding cells.

As Cryotek spoke several of the armored female drones took up
different stations around the room. Like most of the soldiers of the
base they looked identicle to each other, and from a casual observance
they apeared to trasform into some sort of heavy and durable off road
vehicle.

"Your men are yours." Cryotek's words were clear and firm, "When you
leave this base, they will be transported to you." He leaned foward in
his chair. "However the base, since I am expending the man power to
discover it will be mine as well as the protoforms that are under my
control." Cryotek shook his head in negation, "We have worked hard to
recover them, and I see no reason to give them up now."

(TAG)

Preston
